com.att.aro.main

Class ProfileManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.att.aro.main.ProfileManager

  • public class ProfileManager
extends java.lang.Object
    Manages the saving and retrieving of device profiles.

      • getPredefinedProfile

        public Profile getPredefinedProfile(java.lang.String name)
                             throws java.io.IOException,
                                    ProfileException
        Loads the pre-defined profile with the specified name.
        Parameters:
        name - The name of a pre-defined profile returned by the getPredefinedProfileNames() method.
        Returns:
        The pre-defined profile, or null, if the profile is not found.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - - An unexpected exception that, occurs when there is an error reading the profile.
        ProfileException

      • getProfile

                   throws java.io.FileNotFoundException,
                          java.io.IOException,
                          ProfileException,
                          java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Loads the profile that is stored in the specified file.
        Parameters:
        file - The profile file to load.
        Returns:
        A Profile object containing the profile, or null, if the profile file is not found.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - An unexpected exception that occurs when there is an error reading the profile.
        ProfileException
        java.io.FileNotFoundException
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException

      • getLastUserProfile

        public Profile getLastUserProfile(ProfileType profileType)
                           throws ProfileException,
                                  java.io.IOException
        Gets the last profile used for the analysis.
        Returns:
        A Profile object that is the last profile used.
        Throws:
        ProfileException - - If data in the profile is corrupt.
        java.io.IOException - - If the application is unable to load the profile.

      • getDefaultProfile

        public Profile getDefaultProfile(ProfileType profileType)
        Returns the default device profile for the specified profile type (i.e. 3G or LTE)
        Parameters:
        profileType - The device profile type. One of the values of the Profiletype enumeration.
        Returns:
        Profile The default profile.
